comment:
> “Brawlers are the master race, anyone with ranged weapons is a faggot.”
“This”
“Duh, everyone knows melee is imba in BSO. Enjoy easymodo scrub.”
“this is what dps players ACTUALLY believe”
“>be brawler >get shot”

> “What do people think about Hecatel?”
“Total qt if she’s who I’m thinking of. Anyone here from altinnea?”
“Literally who?”
“ayy who hecatelia here?”
“S L U T”
“Watch your tongue, Anon. Speaking ill of royalty in a public forum could have repercussions.”

> “Gem hoarders who PK are shitters and addicts.”
“Seriously, fuck the devs. Every party I’ve been in has turned into a dickstabbing contest.”
“>not ganking shitters for sweet loot”
“— anon, immediately after being PKed”
“nameless get btfo”

Another thread deleted. Janitors are in full force tonight. You guess that’s all the fun you’re going to have.

With a deep breath, you brace yourself for vertigo.

[[ Calibrating, please wait... ]]

> [[ BROKEN SKY ONLINE ]]
> [[ Updating... ]]

Oh, fuckdamnit!

> [[ Update complete. ]]

> [[ Underground: Averron Observatory // Neutral Territory // PVP Disabled ]]

The Observatory is loud and bustling. As you stand, people brush past you. No one you immediately recognize—lots of Nameless. There’s an explosion from the Test Chamber, followed by lots of cheering. Over the terrace railing, you can see a few player-run shop stalls in the open space on the bottom floor.

> Vyx, Tatsumaki, and Smith are online.
> Vision, Donnel, Nel, Liza, Ayla, and Aelriss are offline.

What will you do?
> Head to one of the Observatory’s facilities. (Write-in)
> Search for some kind of information on the message boards. (Write-in)
> Head back toward Averron City.
> Other.
name: BSO
